name: Rejuvenate
description: Melons wrapped in lemon-lime, eucalyptus, & mint.
author: tranceinate

reviews.text: I feel this is a great mix buried under INW Eucalyptus With Mint. At 2% it's the only flavor you get in the profile; it's way too strong and overpowers all the other flavors. Unlike most mints/menthols Eucalyptus doesn't seem to calm down or fade after vaping it for a while, therefore not letting the other flavors shine through. I would try this again at 0.5%-1% with the Eucalyptus.
